description: CheckMate Virtue - Professional Automotive Inspection System
project_rules: NO_NPM_ALLOWED: This project must not use npm, Node.js, or any JavaScript package managers. All dependencies must be Python-based only.
NO_JAVASCRIPT_FRAMEWORKS: No JavaScript frameworks, build tools, or npm packages should be used. Keep the frontend simple with vanilla HTML/CSS/JS only.
PYTHON_ONLY_DEPENDENCIES: All project dependencies must be Python packages managed through pip/requirements.txt only.
